verses.name: Isaiah 1:26
verses.text: And I will restore thy judges as at the first, and thy counsellors as at the beginning: afterward thou shalt be called, The city of righteousness, the faithful city.

verses.name: Isaiah 1:27
verses.text: Zion shall be redeemed with judgment, and her converts with righteousness.

verses.name: Isaiah 1:28
verses.text: And the destruction of the transgressors and of the sinners shall be together, and they that forsake the Lord shall be consumed.

verses.name: Isaiah 1:29
verses.text: For they shall be ashamed of the oaks which ye have desired, and ye shall be confounded for the gardens that ye have chosen.
